meanings.sent1: The leaves flichter in the wind.
meanings.sent2: The candle flame flichters in the dark room.
meanings.sent3: The butterfly flichtered around the garden, entertaining the children.
meanings.sent4: Her heart flichtered with excitement as she approached the finish line.
meanings.sent5: The fireflies flichtering in the night sky created a magical atmosphere.

meanings.sent1: I noticed a quick flichter of light in the distance.
meanings.sent2: The flichter of the firefly caught my attention.
meanings.sent3: The flichter of the old projector added a vintage charm to the movie night.
meanings.sent4: The flichter of the candle flame cast shadows on the wall.
meanings.sent5: The flichter of the leaves in the breeze was mesmerizing to watch.
